title: Classic Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While spaghetti is cooking, heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute more, until fragrant.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, oregano, and basil.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Bring to a simmer and cook for at least 15 minutes, or longer for a richer flavor, stirring occasionally.
Drain spaghetti and add it to the sauce.
Serve immediately with grated Parmesan cheese.
